scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build types --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/types && wasm-pack build data-engine --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/data-engine
scripts.build:wasm:dev: wasm-pack build types --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/types --dev && wasm-pack build data-engine --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/data-engine --dev
scripts.watch:wasm: cargo watch -w types -w data-engine -s 'npm run build:wasm:dev'
